Migration?” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|line_height:1.5″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1662472562147{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]
  • Seek immigration advice from a Regulated Canadian Immigration Consultant (RCIC)
  • Several years of extensive experience in Immigration
  • An exceptional success rate and client satisfaction
  • Reasonable and competitive pricing for quality service
  • Attain a defined strategy for your Canadian Immigration Plan
  • Ongoing follow-up and support
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” bg_color=”#f7f7f7″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”padding-7-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”padding-5-percent” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Frequently Asked Questions

[/vc_column_text][toggles style=”minimal”][toggle color=”Default” title=”Which Immigration Consultation is suitable for you?”][vc_column_text]If you wish to book a one-to-one consultation appointment with team ELAAR but are unsure about which would be the most suitable for you, read the brief below, as it may help you select the right option.

 

Quick Immigration Assessment

You can go for this consultation if you have any specific immigration questions and are looking for a professional’s advice. You can also book this consultation to understand various pathways for studying or working in Canada. Typically, clients who book our quick consultations include candidates who wish to understand Canadian Immigration and the application process, are unsure about their CRS scores and want to improve them.

 

Standard Initial Consultation

If you want to explore Canadian Immigration programs and start your application with ELAAR, this consultation is your entry point. It includes Express Entry, Provincial Nominee Programs, Study to PR, Work permits and more. Typically, clients use this before retaining our assistance for immigration applications, and we adjust this consultation fee in our overall retainer.

 

Business Strategy Meeting

If you are an entrepreneur, investor or individual looking for pathways to Canadian PR through investment, this would be your ideal fit for an initial consultation with ELAAR. The consultation entails discussing business immigration requirements, options, and a personalized strategy to immigrate to Canada through investment in a Canadian franchise/subsidiary/affiliate.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”What does the ‘Quick Immigration Assessment’ entail?”][vc_column_text]The most common inquiries and topics of discussion include:

  • General overview of the document checklist required for an application
  • Guidance with locating specific resources to conclude an active application
  • Concerns about evolving laws and procedures governing Immigration
  • Chain of processes for a particular program
  • Specific question(s) about an application stage
  • Calculation of CRS Scores
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”What does the ‘Standard Immigration Consultation’ entail?”][vc_column_text]The most common inquiries and topics of discussion include:

  • Specific questions pertaining to your immigration application
  • Evaluation of your Immigration Profile
  • Discussing immigration program(s) you would be eligible for
  • Finding your NOC Code
  • In-depth discussion of your Immigration Plan of Action
  • Guidance on overcoming factors of inadmissibility and making your profile stronger
  • Assistance with specific sections of an immigration form
  • Information on how to commence a particular immigration process/application
  • Other complex issues involving legal aspects of immigration and its laws that require professional expertise
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”What does the ‘Business Immigration Strategy Meeting’ entail?”][vc_column_text]The most common inquiries and topics of discussion include:

  • Discussing pathways to immigrate via Business Immigration Programs
  • Guidance on acquiring Canadian PR through Investment
  • Overview of your current Business plan
  • Evaluating candidate’s profile for programs such as ICT, Start-Up Visa, Self-Employed Persons Program, Investor Visa and others
  • Addressing questions about Business Immigration Application
  • Understanding Financial Requirements to start business operations in Canada
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”Will my consultation fee be adjusted if I decide to retain Colossus Migration for my immigration application/process?”][vc_column_text]Suppose you decide to proceed with our professional services and hire us for your immigration process(es) after the consultation session with RCIC. In that case, your consultation fee will be adjusted in the Retainer Agreement Fee if you sign up within 30 days of the consultation.

*Conditions Apply.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][/toggles][/vc_column][/vc_row]
